CustomField.formula: 'Primary: ' & Primary_Full_Name__c & IF(ISBLANK(Account_Secondary__c), '' , ' | ' & 'Secondary: ' & Secondary_Full_Name__c) & IF(ISBLANK(Account_Tertiary__c), '' , ' | ' & 'Tertiary: ' & Tertiary_Full_Name__c) & IF(ISBLANK(Account_Quaternary__c), '' , ' | ' & 'Quaternary: ' & Quaternary_Full_Name__c)
CustomField.label: Account Managers
